constraints.name: fk_t_records_last_edited_by
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (last_edited_by) REFERENCES m_members(member_id) ON UPDATE SET NULL ON DELETE SET NULL

constraints.name: fk_t_records_posted_by
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (posted_by) REFERENCES m_members(member_id) ON UPDATE SET NULL ON DELETE SET NULL

constraints.name: fk_t_records_record_type_id
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (record_type_id) REFERENCES m_record_types(record_type_id) ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT

constraints.name: t_records_pkey
constraints.def: PRIMARY KEY (t_records_pkey)

indexes.name: t_attached_messages_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX t_attached_messages_pkey ON public.t_attached_messages USING btree (t_attached_messages_pkey)

indexes.name: idx_t_attached_messages_id
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_t_attached_messages_id ON public.t_attached_messages USING btree (message_id, attachable_item_id)

constraints.name: fk_t_attached_messages_attachable_item_id
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (attachable_item_id) REFERENCES t_attachable_items(attachable_item_id) ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT

constraints.name: fk_t_attached_messages_message_id
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (message_id) REFERENCES t_messages(message_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE

constraints.name: t_attached_messages_pkey
constraints.def: PRIMARY KEY (t_attached_messages_pkey)
